Package eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib

Provides core library of KD This package contains all the classes used to process, extract and analyse documents

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KD_configuration
    This class represents the configuration object used by the KD Core
    KD_core
    Core Class of the tool.
    KD_keyconcept
    Object representing a single key-phrase with all it's attributes
    KD_loader
    This object updates the serialized configuration files with the data specified by the user in the configuration txt files
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KD_configuration.ColumExtraction
    Enum Type that setups the columns configuration in the input file.
    KD_configuration.Group
    Enum Type that setups the lemmatization approach of the tool (Experimental).
    KD_configuration.Prefer_Specific_Concept
    Enum Type that gives more relevance to specific(longer) key-phrases.
    KD_configuration.Tagset
    Enum Type that setups the tagset used in the preprocessed file.
    KD_core.Language
    Enum Type that setups the language of the input files.
    KD_core.Threads
    Enum Type that setups the number of threads used by the tool.

Package eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib Description

Provides core library of KD This package contains all the classes used to process, extract and analyse documents
Author:
Giovanni Moretti - DH Group FBK.
